directions: In a medium mixing bowl, stir together butter and chocolate.  Beat in corn syrup,  2 cups of confectioner's sugar, powdered milk and vanilla.  Dough will be stiff.

Sprinkle a work surface with the remaining 1 cup confectioners' sugar.  Turn dough out onto work surface and knead until remaining sugar is incorporated.  Shape into small logs and wrap in waxed paper.
ingredients: 2 (1 ounce) squares unsweetened chocolate, melted and cooled
title: Chewy Chocolate Candies
